item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 1:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. GeoCities in 1995: Building a Home Page on the Internet (32 points | 15 comments)
2. Polars Cloud: The Distributed Cloud Architecture to Run Polars Anywhere (141 points | 39 comments)
3. Why do I find Rust inadequate for text compression codecs? (23 points | 1 comment)
4. Uber users in Austin are getting matched with Waymo robotaxis (26 points | 16 comments)

10. Athena spacecraft declared dead after toppling over on moon (157 points | 210 comments)
11. Microsoft is plotting a future without OpenAI (290 points | 276 comments)

13. Age Verification Laws: A Backdoor to Surveillance (291 points | 202 comments)
14. ParadeDB (YC S23) Is Hiring a Rust Database Engineer ( | hide)

19. How did places like Bell Labs know how to ask the right questions? (3 points | discuss)
20. Betting on the Pope was the original prediction market (122 points | 67 comments)
21. 'Next-Level' Chaos Traces the True Limit of Predictability (16 points | 2 comments)

25. Differentiable Logic Cellular Automata (419 points | 80 comments)
26. Extracting time series features: a powerful method from a obscure paper [pdf] (10 points | 2 comments)
27. Matters Computational (2010) [pdf] (143 points | 15 comments)
28. The necessity of Nussbaum (101 points | 111 comments)
29. Show HN: A big tech dev experience for an open source CMS (41 points | 28 comments)
30. Natural occurring molecule rivals Ozempic in weight loss, sidesteps side effects (365 points | 313 comments)
